required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dried Purple Laver (Nori) as a Food Source of Vitamin B12 in Vegetarians
clinical_study.official_title: The Bioavailability of Vitamin B12 From Nori in Vegetarians: a Dose Response Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is an intervention study aiming to understand the bioavailability of vitamin B12 from nori for vegetarians.

detailed_description.textblock: Thirty vegetarian participants will be randomly assigned to one of three intervention arms: (1) 5g of nori (4 sheets, containing 2.4μg vitamin B12), (2) 8g nori (7 sheets, containing 4μg vitamin B12), (3) control group (no nori). At baseline and end of 4 weeks, participants will be measured on serum vitamin B12, methylmalonic acid, holotranscobalamin, homocysteine and folate.

primary_outcome.description: Assessing the change in serum holotranscobalamin after consuming varying doses of nori

primary_outcome.measure: Change in methylmalonic acid in 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Assessing the change in serum methylmalonic acid after consuming varying doses of nori

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in serum vitamin B12 concentration in 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Assessing the change in serum vitamin B12 after consuming varying doses of nori
Assessing the change in serum homocysteine after consuming varying doses of nori

arm_group.description: Participants need to consume 4 sheets (5g) of dried purple laver (Nori) daily for 4 weeks.
Participants need to consume 7 sheets (8g) of dried purple laver (Nori) daily for 4 weeks.

intervention.description: Dried purple laver (Nori) that has been test to have bioactivity vitamin B12 will be given for intervention groups.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Vegetarians (including vegan, ovo-vegetarian, lacto-vegetarian, lacto-ovo vegetarian)
- Duration of the vegetarian diet: at least 1 year
- Aged 20-60 years old
- Have not taken vitamin B12 or folate supplement within 1 year
- Willing to adhere to study intervention and be tested for vitamin B12 related biomarkers.
- Familiar with LINE application on smartphone
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any disease or surgery that affects the vitamin B12 status (Pernicious anemia, Gastrointestinal disease and surgery, Pancreatic diseases, Chronic kidney disease)
- Hyperthyroidism
- Previous adverse reaction to nori
- Have taken antacid or metformin in the past 1 week
- Alcoholic and not willing to abstinence from alcoholic beverages

overall_official.affiliation: Fu-Jen Catholic University, Department of Nutritional Science

facility.name: Department of Nutritional Science, Fu-Jen Catholic University
